parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from clusters. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

>  If you specify TagKey and this parameter, this parameter does not take effect.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of cluster N. Valid values of N: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **ALIYUN::ADB::CLUSTER**.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The key of tag N. Valid values of N: 1 to 20.
